Header.title: Association for the Study of Chronic Diseases

About.intro: Asociația de Cercetare a Maladiilor Cronice a fost fondată în 2010 de un grup de doctori tineri ca unica organizație multidisciplinara medicala în Republica Moldova. Scopul principal a organizației este abordarea multidisciplinara integrata a maladiilor cronice netransmisibile, precum diabetul, maladii cardiovasculare etc.
About.mission: Created to promote an integrated multidisciplinary approach to chronic noncommunicable diseases, such as diabetes, cardiovascular diseases, eye and dental diseases.
About.history: Founded in 2010 by a group of young medical specialists, ASCD is the first multidisciplinary medical association in Moldova.
About.focusAreas: Prevention and access to care for people suffering of: Diabetes and Tuberculosis
